name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube plus (floating player, screenshot, cinema mode)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced Youtube experience! Picture in picture (floating player), screenshots and improved cinema mode! Player red buttons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Main features: 1: Picture in picture mode (floating player) / 2: Save screenshots / 3: Improved cinema/theater mode.
All features appear as red buttons directly inside the player ! 

1. Bored of having to stay on Youtube to watch your favorite videos ?

Now you can watch your favorite YouTube videos while you work, browse, or multitask, without being tethered to your Chrome window ! 
A convenient pop-out icon is seamlessly integrated into the player control buttons, making it effortless to launch the floating video player in just one click!
This extension keeps your video always on top, letting you minimize Chrome and still keep an eye on the action. Whether you're following tutorials, enjoying entertainment, or staying productive, the floating player ensures uninterrupted viewing no matter what you're doing. 

Try it now and take your multitasking to the next level!

2. Want to save a screenshot for later, share it with a friend, or use it for work? 

Now you can! 

3. The cinema/theater mode is not big enough ? Now it is !
